definitions.title: indef.
definitions.body: what? (BH [[מָה]]; Nab. [[מה]]; Zinj. [[מ]]; Targum [[מא]]; Syr. mo0; Ar. ma0: cf. W:CG 124 f.);—

definitions.title: 1 b
definitions.body: end) Da 2:22 [[ידע מח בחשׁוכא]] knoweth what is in darkness, Ezr 6:9: so [[מָה דִּי]] (cf. [[דִּי]]

definitions.title: 1 b:
definitions.body: so Nab.; Palm. [[מא די]], [[מדי]], Lzb:306 Cooke:320, 332) Da 2:28, Da 2:29, Da 2:29, Da 2:45, Ezr 6:8 [[למא די תעבדון]] with regard to what ye shall do, Ezr 7:18 (= whatsoever).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[לְמָה]] why? (cf. BH [[לָמָּה]]) Ezr 4:22 be not slack herein: why should damage grow, etc., virtually = lest damage grow (LXX mh/ pote), Ezr 7:23 [[די למה להוא קחף]] for why should there be wrath ? = lest [LXX mh/ pote] there be wrath (cf. Targum [[דִּילְמָא]], Syr. dalmo0 lest: and v. [[מָה]]
